resources.string: membo.ai needs microphone access to enable voice-based study mode. This helps you practice hands-free and improve pronunciation. We only access the microphone during study sessions.
membo.ai needs storage access to save your study materials offline. This ensures you can study even without internet connection. Your content remains private and encrypted.
